mapper.select: select m.msg_id as msgId, m.send_id as sendId, m.dest_id as destId, m.msg_type as msgType, m.content,m.ts as createtime from ims_msg m where ((m.send_id=#{sendId} and m.dest_id=#{destId}) or (m.send_id = #{destId} and m.dest_id=#{sendId})) and m.ts > >= < <= (select mm.ts from ims_msg mm where mm.msg_id=#{msgId}) order by m.ts desc limit #{pageSize}
